title: Chocolate and raspberry doughnuts
description: Have you mastered the perfect doughnut yet? Here are two flavour variations from the master himself, Paul Hollywood. Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a deep-fat fryer and two small, disposable piping bags.
ingredients: 250g/9oz strong white flour, plus extra for dusting
25g/1oz caster sugar, plus extra for rolling
100g/3½oz plain chocolate (36% cocoa solids), broken into 9 squares
